snippet: Human Rights Watch said Friday that visits to two Syrian security centers contained proof of widespread, arbitrary detentions and torture by the government of President Bashar al-Assad.
abstract: Human Rights Watch says visits to two Syrian security centers captured by rebel fighters contain proof of widespread, arbitrary detentions and torture by government of Pres Bashar al-Assad.
